roleset.name: To make emphatic

roles.note: See emphasize.01 for other argument examples.

example.name: Emphaticize away, then scape your goats!
example.text: As the hearings begin , the self - important Sen. Bowman -LRB- Jerome Kilty -RRB- announces : `` Let me emphaticize one thing at the outset : We are not looking for hides to skin nor goats to scape . ''

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire. Comparison to emphasize.01. I don't think this is a real word...yet!
